agenda.description: HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF WORK SESSION COMMITTEE: Energy Resources TIME & DATE: 2:00 PM, Monday, February 25, 2019 PLACE: 1701 Congress Avenue Austin, TX CHAIR: Rep. Chris Paddie The Committee will meet to tour the Railroad Commission of Texas' main office at 1701 Congress Avenue in Austin, TX. The meeting will convene in the Willa Mae Conference Room.
